title: Raised Fist logo - Grunge/Stamp
content:
Hi, this is my first post.  
So, I'm looking for the type in the band's logo. The two types could be different, or the same but simply capitalized and and non-capitalized characters. Any ideas? I've tried whatthefont, identifont, type navigator, and what not, but all in vain...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo - sound of the republic.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20111209002704/http:/typophile.com/files/logo%20-%20sound%20of%20the%20republic.jpg) | 133.25 KB |
author: halocline_

comments.content: It appears to be the base of it. But I can't find any grunge modifications to any Univers font, so this might be some sort of vector modification, and the similar letters are just copied... Anyway, thanks Lex.
